name: Not What It Seems (maoap, Vlachovka)
description:
This game is about a little mouse who wants to know the truth but its parents aren't happy about it. Gather enough cheese to please them and you may reveal what is going on.

Controls
Move with arrows or WSAD.

Credits
Karel Vlachovský - Programming & Game Design
Karolína Vlachovská - Visuals & Game Design

Sounds are downloaded from freesounds.org.
